00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief 1-bit SD bus driver for SD cards with WISHBONE master and slave interface.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief bus_sd.v
00030 */
00031 module bus_sd(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input               clk_30,
00035     input               reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name WISHBONE master

00039     //% @{
00040     output reg          CYC_O,
00041     output reg [31:0]   DAT_O,
00042     output reg          STB_O,
00043     output reg          WE_O,
00044     output reg [31:2]   ADR_O,
00045     output [3:0]        SEL_O,
00046     input [31:0]        DAT_I,
00047     input               ACK_I,
00048     input               ERR_I,
00049     input               RTY_I,
00050     // TAG_TYPE: TGC_O
00051     output              SGL_O,
00052     output              BLK_O,
00053     output              RMW_O,
00054     // TAG_TYPE: TGA_O
00055     output [2:0]        CTI_O,
00056     output [1:0]        BTE_O,
00057     //% @}
00058     
00059     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00060     //% @{
00061     output [31:0]       slave_DAT_O,
00062     input [31:0]        slave_DAT_I,
00063     output reg          ACK_O,
00064     output              ERR_O,
00065     output              RTY_O,
00066     input               CYC_I,
00067     input [3:2]         ADR_I,
00068     input               STB_I,
00069     input               WE_I,
00070     input [3:0]         SEL_I,
00071     //% @}
00072     
00073     //% \name SD bus 1-bit hardware interface

00074     //% @{
00075     output reg          sd_clk_o = 1'b0,
00076     inout               sd_cmd_io,
00077     inout               sd_dat_io,
00078     //% @}
00079     
00080     //% \name Debug signals

00081     //% @{
00082     output [7:0]        debug_sd
00083     //% @}
00084 );
00085 
00086 /***********************************************************************************************************************
00087                                                       Wishbone interface
00088  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
00089  
00090 assign debug_sd = { (reset_n == 1'b0), (error_count == 16'd65535), 2'b0, control_state };
00091 
00092 //---------------------------------------------------- wishbone master
00093 assign SGL_O = 1'b1;
00094 assign BLK_O = 1'b0;
00095 assign RMW_O = 1'b0;
00096 assign SEL_O = 4'b1111;
00097 assign BTE_O = 2'b00;
00098 assign CTI_O = 3'b000;
00099 
00100 reg bus_error;
00101 reg data_read;
00102 reg data_write;
00103 reg [31:0] data_part_contents;
00104 
00105 //STB_O,CYC_O,WE_O,DAT_O,
00106 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00107     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00108         ADR_O <= 30'd0;
00109         STB_O <= 1'b0;
00110         CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00111         WE_O <= 1'b0;
00112         DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00113         bus_error <= 1'b0;
00114         data_read <= 1'b0;
00115         data_write <= 1'b0;
00116         data_part_contents <= 32'd0;
00117     end
00118     else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_READY_PART && data_read == 1'b0) begin
00119         if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
00120             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00121             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00122             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00123             
00124             data_read <= 1'b1;
00125         end
00126         else if(RTY_I == 1'b1) begin
00127             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00128             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00129             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00130         end
00131         else if(ERR_I == 1'b1) begin
00132             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00133             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00134             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00135             
00136             data_read <= 1'b1;
00137             bus_error <= 1'b1;
00138         end
00139         else begin
00140             ADR_O <= wb_address_base + { 23'b0, part_counter };
00141             STB_O <= 1'b1;
00142             CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00143             WE_O <= 1'b1;
00144             DAT_O <= data_part;
00145         end
00146     end
00147     else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART && data_write == 1'b0) begin
00148         if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
00149             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00150             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00151             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00152             data_part_contents <= DAT_I;
00153             
00154             data_write <= 1'b1;
00155         end
00156         else if(RTY_I == 1'b1) begin
00157             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00158             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00159             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00160         end
00161         else if(ERR_I == 1'b1) begin
00162             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00163             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00164             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00165             
00166             data_write <= 1'b1;
00167             bus_error <= 1'b1;
00168         end
00169         else begin
00170             ADR_O <= wb_address_base + { 23'b0, part_counter };
00171             STB_O <= 1'b1;
00172             CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00173             WE_O <= 1'b0;
00174         end
00175     end
00176     else if(data_state != S_DATA_READ_READY_PART && data_state != S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART) begin
00177         if(status == STATUS_ERROR) begin
00178             bus_error <= 1'b0;
00179         end
00180         
00181         data_read <= 1'b0;
00182         data_write <= 1'b0;
00183     end
00184 end
00185 
00186 //---------------------------------------------------- wishbone slave
00187 assign ERR_O = 1'b0;
00188 assign RTY_O = 1'b0;
00189 assign slave_DAT_O = {29'd0, status[2:0]};
00190 
00191 // write only
00192 reg [31:0] sd_address;
00193 reg [31:0] sd_block_count;
00194 reg [1:0] control;
00195 reg [31:2] wb_address_base;
00196 
00197 parameter [1:0]
00198     CONTROL_IDLE        = 2'd0,
00199     CONTROL_REINIT      = 2'd1,
00200     CONTROL_READ        = 2'd2,
00201     CONTROL_WRITE       = 2'd3;
00202 
00203 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00204     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00205         wb_address_base <= 30'd0;
00206         sd_address <= 32'd0;
00207         sd_block_count <= 32'd0;
00208         control <= 2'd0;
00209         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00210     end
00211     else begin
00212         if(control_state == S_CTRL_PRE_IDLE) begin
00213             sd_block_count <= sd_block_count - 32'd1;
00214             sd_address <= sd_address + 32'd1;
00215             wb_address_base <= wb_address_base + 30'd128;
00216             
00217             if(sd_block_count == 32'd1) control <= CONTROL_IDLE;
00218             ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00219         end
00220         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1) begin
00221             ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00222 
00223             if(ADR_I[3:2] == 2'b00) begin
00224                 wb_address_base[31:24] <= (SEL_I[3] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[31:24] : wb_address_base[31:24];
00225                 wb_address_base[23:16] <= (SEL_I[2] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[23:16] : wb_address_base[23:16];
00226                 wb_address_base[15:8] <= (SEL_I[1] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[15:8] : wb_address_base[15:8];
00227                 wb_address_base[7:2] <= (SEL_I[0] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[7:2] : wb_address_base[7:2]; 
00228             end
00229             else if(ADR_I[3:2] == 2'b01) begin
00230                 sd_address[31:24] <= (SEL_I[3] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[31:24] : sd_address[31:24];
00231                 sd_address[23:16] <= (SEL_I[2] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[23:16] : sd_address[23:16];
00232                 sd_address[15:8] <= (SEL_I[1] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[15:8] : sd_address[15:8];
00233                 sd_address[7:0] <= (SEL_I[0] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[7:0] : sd_address[7:0]; 
00234             end
00235             else if(ADR_I[3:2] == 2'b10) begin
00236                 sd_block_count[31:24] <= (SEL_I[3] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[31:24] : sd_block_count[31:24];
00237                 sd_block_count[23:16] <= (SEL_I[2] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[23:16] : sd_block_count[23:16];
00238                 sd_block_count[15:8] <= (SEL_I[1] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[15:8] : sd_block_count[15:8];
00239                 sd_block_count[7:0] <= (SEL_I[0] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[7:0] : sd_block_count[7:0]; 
00240             end
00241             else if(ADR_I[3:2] == 2'b11) begin
00242                 control[1:0] <= (SEL_I[0] == 1'b1) ? slave_DAT_I[1:0] : control[1:0];
00243             end
00244         end
00245         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I[3:2] == 2'b00) begin
00246             ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00247         end
00248         else begin
00249             ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00250         end
00251     end
00252     
00253 end
00254 
00255 /***********************************************************************************************************************
00256                                                       Control state machine
00257  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
00258 
00259 reg [3:0] control_state;
00260 reg [15:0] error_count;
00261 reg [2:0] status;
00262 reg [37:0] cmd_send_contents;
00263 
00264 reg start_cmd;
00265 reg start_read;
00266 reg start_write;
00267 
00268 `define CRC7_REVERSE crc7[0],crc7[1],crc7[2],crc7[3],crc7[4],crc7[5],crc7[6]
00269 
00270 parameter [3:0]
00271     S_CTRL_INIT         = 4'd0,
00272     S_CTRL_CMD0         = 4'd1,
00273     S_CTRL_CMD8         = 4'd2,
00274     S_CTRL_CMD55        = 4'd3,
00275     S_CTRL_ACMD41       = 4'd4,
00276     S_CTRL_CMD2         = 4'd5,
00277     S_CTRL_CMD3         = 4'd6,
00278     S_CTRL_CMD7         = 4'd7,
00279     S_CTRL_PRE_IDLE     = 4'd8,
00280     S_CTRL_IDLE         = 4'd9,
00281     S_CTRL_CMD17_READ   = 4'd10,
00282     S_CTRL_CMD24_WRITE  = 4'd11;
00283 
00284 parameter [2:0]
00285     STATUS_INIT         = 3'd0,
00286     STATUS_INIT_ERROR   = 3'd1,
00287     STATUS_IDLE         = 3'd2,
00288     STATUS_READ         = 3'd3,
00289     STATUS_WRITE        = 3'd4,
00290     STATUS_ERROR        = 3'd5;
00291     
00292 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00293     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00294         control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00295         status <= STATUS_INIT;
00296         cmd_send_contents <= 38'd0;
00297         start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00298         start_read <= 1'b0;
00299         start_write <= 1'b0;
00300         error_count <= 16'd0;
00301     end
00302     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_INIT && error_count == 16'd65535) begin
00303         status <= STATUS_INIT_ERROR;
00304         
00305         if(control == CONTROL_REINIT) begin
00306             error_count <= 16'd0;
00307             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00308         end
00309     end
00310     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_INIT) begin
00311         status <= STATUS_INIT;
00312         
00313         if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00314             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00315             //CMD0, no arguments
00316             cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd0, 32'd0 };
00317             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD0;
00318         end
00319     end
00320     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD0) begin
00321         
00322         if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR) begin
00323             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00324             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00325         end
00326         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00327             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00328             //CMD8, supply voltage, check pattern
00329             cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd8, 20'd0, 4'b0001, 8'b10101010 };
00330             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD8;
00331         end
00332         else start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00333     end
00334     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD8) begin
00335         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00336             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00337         end
00338         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00339             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && cmd_reply != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd8, 20'd0, 4'b0001, 8'b10101010, `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 })
00340         ) begin
00341             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00342             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00343         end
00344         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE) begin
00345             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00346             //CMD55, RCA
00347             cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd55, 16'd0, 16'd0};
00348             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD55;
00349         end
00350     end
00351     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD55) begin
00352         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00353             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00354         end
00355         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00356             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE &&
00357                 (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd55 } || cmd_reply[39:27] != 13'b0 || cmd_reply[24:21] != 4'b0 ||
00358                  cmd_reply[13] != 1'b1 || cmd_reply[11] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[7:0] != { `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 }
00359                 )
00360             )
00361         ) begin
00362             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00363             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00364         end
00365         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00366             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00367             //ACMD41, 
00368             cmd_send_contents <= {  6'd41,                              //command index
00369                                     1'b0,                               //reserved bit
00370                                     1'b1,                               //host capacity support HCS(OCR[30])
00371                                     6'b0,                               //reserved bits
00372                                     24'b0001_0000_0000_0000_0000_0000   //VDD voltage window OCR[23:0]
00373             };
00374             control_state <= S_CTRL_ACMD41;
00375         end
00376     end
00377     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_ACMD41) begin
00378         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00379             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00380         end
00381         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00382             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'b111111 } || 
00383                 cmd_reply[39:38] != 2'b11 || cmd_reply[7:0] != {7'b1111111, 1'b1 })
00384             )
00385         ) begin
00386             if(error_count == 16'd65535) begin
00387                 control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00388             end
00389             else begin
00390                 error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00391                 start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00392                 //CMD55, RCA
00393                 cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd55, 16'd0, 16'd0};
00394                 control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD55;
00395             end
00396         end
00397         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00398             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00399             //CMD2, no arguments
00400             cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd2, 32'd0 };
00401             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD2;
00402         end
00403     end
00404     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD2) begin
00405         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00406             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00407         end
00408         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00409             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && cmd_reply[0] != 1'b1)
00410         ) begin
00411             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00412             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00413         end
00414         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00415             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00416             //CMD3, no arguments
00417             cmd_send_contents <= { 6'd3, 32'd0 };
00418             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD3;
00419         end
00420     end
00421     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD3) begin
00422         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00423             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00424         end
00425         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00426             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE &&
00427                 (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd3 } || 
00428                  /*23:8= 23,22,19,12:0 from card status**/
00429                  cmd_reply[23:21] != 3'b0 || cmd_reply[13] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[11] != 1'b0 || 
00430                  cmd_reply[7:0] != { `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 }
00431                 )
00432             )
00433         ) begin
00434             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00435             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00436         end
00437         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00438             
00439             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00440             //CMD7, no arguments
00441             cmd_send_contents <= {  6'd7,               //command index
00442                                     cmd_reply[39:24],   //RCA
00443                                     16'd0               //stuff bits
00444             };
00445             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD7;
00446         end
00447     end
00448     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD7) begin
00449         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00450             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00451         end
00452         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00453             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE &&
00454                 (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd7 } || cmd_reply[39:27] != 13'b0 || cmd_reply[24:21] != 4'b0 ||
00455                  cmd_reply[13] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[11] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[7:0] != { `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 }
00456                 )
00457             )
00458         ) begin
00459             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00460             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00461         end
00462         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0) begin
00463             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00464             
00465             error_count <= 16'd0;
00466             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00467         end
00468     end
00469     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_PRE_IDLE) begin
00470         control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00471         
00472         if(bus_error == 1'b1) error_count <= 16'd65535;
00473     end
00474     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_IDLE && error_count != 16'd0) begin
00475         status <= STATUS_ERROR;
00476         
00477         if(control == CONTROL_IDLE) begin
00478             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00479             error_count <= 16'd0;
00480         end
00481         else if(control == CONTROL_REINIT) begin
00482             control_state <= S_CTRL_INIT;
00483             error_count <= 16'd0;
00484         end
00485     end
00486     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_IDLE) begin
00487         if(control == CONTROL_READ && sd_block_count != 32'd0) begin
00488             status <= STATUS_READ;
00489             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00490             start_read <= 1'b1;
00491             //CMD17, sector address
00492             cmd_send_contents <= {  6'd17,              //command index
00493                                     sd_address[31:0]    //sector address
00494             };
00495             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD17_READ;
00496         end
00497         else if(control == CONTROL_WRITE && sd_block_count != 32'd0) begin
00498             status <= STATUS_WRITE;
00499             start_cmd <= 1'b1;
00500             start_write <= 1'b1;
00501             //CMD24, sector address
00502             cmd_send_contents <= {  6'd24,              //command index
00503                                     sd_address[31:0]    //sector address
00504             };
00505             control_state <= S_CTRL_CMD24_WRITE;
00506         end
00507         else begin
00508             status <= STATUS_IDLE;
00509         end
00510     end
00511     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD17_READ) begin
00512         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00513             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00514         end
00515         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00516             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE &&
00517                 (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd17 } || cmd_reply[39:27] != 13'b0 || cmd_reply[24:21] != 4'b0 ||
00518                  cmd_reply[13] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[11] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[7:0] != { `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 }
00519                 )
00520             )
00521         ) begin
00522             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00523             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00524         end
00525         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_read == 1'b1) begin
00526             start_read <= 1'b0;
00527         end
00528         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_read == 1'b0 && data_state == S_DATA_READ_ERROR) begin
00529             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00530             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00531         end
00532         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_read == 1'b0 && data_state == S_DATA_IDLE) begin
00533             error_count <= 16'd0;
00534             control_state <= S_CTRL_PRE_IDLE;
00535         end
00536     end
00537     else if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD24_WRITE) begin
00538         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00539             start_cmd <= 1'b0;
00540         end
00541         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR ||
00542             (cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE &&
00543                 (cmd_reply[47:40] != { 1'b0, 1'b0, 6'd24 } || cmd_reply[39:27] != 13'b0 || cmd_reply[24:21] != 4'b0 ||
00544                  cmd_reply[13] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[11] != 1'b0 || cmd_reply[7:0] != { `CRC7_REVERSE, 1'b1 }
00545                 )
00546             )
00547         ) begin
00548             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00549             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00550         end
00551         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_write == 1'b1) begin
00552             start_write <= 1'b0;
00553         end
00554         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_write == 1'b0 && data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR) begin
00555             error_count <= error_count + 16'd1;
00556             control_state <= S_CTRL_IDLE;
00557         end
00558         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE && start_cmd == 1'b0 && start_write == 1'b0 && data_state == S_DATA_IDLE) begin
00559             error_count <= 16'd0;
00560             control_state <= S_CTRL_PRE_IDLE;
00561         end
00562     end
00563 end
00564 
00565 /***********************************************************************************************************************
00566                                                       SD interface
00567  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
00568 
00569 reg sd_cmd_o = 1'b1;
00570 reg sd_dat_o = 1'b1;
00571 
00572 assign sd_cmd_io = (sd_cmd_enable == 1'b1) ? sd_cmd_o : 1'bZ;
00573 assign sd_dat_io = (sd_data_enable == 1'b1) ? sd_dat_o : 1'bZ;
00574 
00575 //CID register not interpreted: CRC7 not checked, always accepted
00576 
00577 //---------------------------------------------------- SD data
00578 
00579 reg sd_data_enable;
00580 reg [3:0] data_state;
00581 reg [23:0] data_counter;
00582 reg [6:0] part_counter;
00583 reg [15:0] crc16;
00584 reg [31:0] data_part;
00585 reg clk_data_ena;
00586 reg clk_master_ena;
00587 
00588 parameter [3:0]
00589     S_DATA_IDLE                                 = 4'd0,
00590     S_DATA_READ_START_BIT                       = 4'd1,
00591     S_DATA_READ_CONTENTS                        = 4'd2,
00592     S_DATA_READ_READY_PART                      = 4'd3,
00593     S_DATA_READ_READY_PART_CONTINUE             = 4'd4,
00594     S_DATA_READ_CRC16_END_BIT                   = 4'd5,
00595     S_DATA_READ_ERROR                           = 4'd6,
00596     S_DATA_WRITE_START_BIT                      = 4'd7,
00597     S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART                     = 4'd8,
00598     S_DATA_WRITE_CONTENTS                       = 4'd9,
00599     S_DATA_WRITE_CRC16_END_BIT                  = 4'd10,
00600     S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_START               = 4'd11,
00601     S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_CONTENTS_END_BIT    = 4'd12,
00602     S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_START                     = 4'd13,
00603     S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_WAIT                      = 4'd14,
00604     S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR                          = 4'd15;
00605     
00606 
00607 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00608     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00609         sd_data_enable  <= 1'b0;
00610         data_state      <= S_DATA_IDLE;
00611         data_counter    <= 24'd0;
00612         part_counter    <= 7'd0;
00613         crc16           <= 16'd0;
00614         data_part       <= 32'd0;
00615         clk_data_ena    <= 1'b0;
00616         clk_master_ena  <= 1'b1;
00617         sd_dat_o        <= 1'b1;
00618     end
00619     else if(data_state == S_DATA_IDLE) begin
00620         //do not wait for read command and reply
00621         if(start_read == 1'b1) begin
00622             data_state <= S_DATA_READ_START_BIT;
00623         end
00624         //wait for write command and reply
00625         else if(start_write == 1'b1 && start_cmd == 1'b0 && cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE) begin
00626             data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_START_BIT;
00627         end
00628     end
00629     else if(clk_counter == 2'd0) begin
00630         
00631         //wait for response and data simultaneously (data read)
00632         if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_START_BIT) begin
00633             clk_data_ena <= 1'b1;
00634             
00635             if(sd_dat_io == 1'b0) begin
00636                 crc16 <= { sd_dat_io ^ crc16[0], crc16[15:12], sd_dat_io ^ crc16[11] ^ crc16[0], crc16[10:5],
00637                     sd_dat_io ^ crc16[4] ^ crc16[0], crc16[3:1] };
00638                 
00639                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_CONTENTS;
00640                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00641             end
00642             else if(data_counter == 24'd65535) begin
00643                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_ERROR;
00644                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00645             end
00646             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00647         end
00648         else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_CONTENTS) begin
00649             crc16 <= { sd_dat_io ^ crc16[0], crc16[15:12], sd_dat_io ^ crc16[11] ^ crc16[0],
00650                 crc16[10:5], sd_dat_io ^ crc16[4] ^ crc16[0], crc16[3:1] };
00651             data_part <= { data_part[30:0], sd_dat_io };
00652             
00653             if(data_counter == 24'd30) begin
00654                 clk_master_ena <= 1'b0;
00655                 data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00656             end
00657             else if(data_counter == 24'd31) begin
00658                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_READY_PART;
00659                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00660             end
00661             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00662         end
00663         else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_READY_PART) begin
00664             if(data_read == 1'b1) begin
00665                 clk_master_ena <= 1'b1;
00666                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_READY_PART_CONTINUE;
00667             end
00668         end
00669         else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_READY_PART_CONTINUE) begin
00670             if(part_counter == 7'd127) begin
00671                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_CRC16_END_BIT;
00672                 part_counter <= 7'd0;
00673             end
00674             else begin
00675                 data_state <= S_DATA_READ_CONTENTS;
00676                 part_counter <= part_counter + 7'd1;
00677             end
00678         end
00679         else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_CRC16_END_BIT) begin
00680             data_part <= { sd_dat_io, data_part[31:1] };
00681             
00682             if(data_counter == 24'd16) begin
00683                 if(data_part[31:16] != crc16[15:0] || sd_dat_io != 1'b1) begin
00684                     data_state <= S_DATA_READ_ERROR;
00685                     data_counter <= 24'd0;
00686                 end
00687                 else begin
00688                     clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00689                     data_state <= S_DATA_IDLE;
00690                     data_counter <= 24'd0;
00691                     crc16 <= 16'd0;
00692                 end
00693             end
00694             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00695         end
00696         else if(data_state == S_DATA_READ_ERROR) begin
00697             clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00698             data_state <= S_DATA_IDLE;
00699             data_counter <= 24'd0;
00700             crc16 <= 16'd0;
00701         end
00702         
00703         //send data on data line, wait for crc status, wait while busy on data line (data write)
00704         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_START_BIT) begin
00705             sd_dat_o <= 1'b0;
00706             crc16 <= { 1'b0 ^ crc16[0], crc16[15:12], 1'b0 ^ crc16[11] ^ crc16[0], crc16[10:5],
00707                 1'b0 ^ crc16[4] ^ crc16[0], crc16[3:1] };
00708             
00709             sd_data_enable <= 1'b1;
00710             clk_data_ena <= 1'b1;
00711             data_counter <= 24'd0;
00712             data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART;
00713         end
00714         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART) begin
00715             
00716             if(data_write == 1'b1) begin
00717                 clk_data_ena <= 1'b1;
00718                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_CONTENTS;
00719                 data_part <= data_part_contents;
00720             end
00721             else begin
00722                 clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00723             end
00724         end
00725         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_CONTENTS) begin
00726             sd_dat_o <= data_part[31];
00727             crc16 <= { data_part[31] ^ crc16[0], crc16[15:12], data_part[31] ^ crc16[11] ^ crc16[0], crc16[10:5],
00728                 data_part[31] ^ crc16[4] ^ crc16[0], crc16[3:1] };
00729             data_part <= { data_part[30:0], 1'b0 };
00730             
00731             if(data_counter == 24'd31) begin
00732                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00733                 
00734                 if(part_counter == 7'd127) begin
00735                     part_counter <= 7'd0;
00736                     data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_CRC16_END_BIT;
00737                 end
00738                 else begin
00739                     clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00740                     part_counter <= part_counter + 7'd1;
00741                     data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_READY_PART;
00742                 end
00743             end
00744             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00745         end
00746         
00747         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_CRC16_END_BIT) begin
00748             sd_dat_o <= crc16[0];
00749             
00750             if(data_counter == 24'd16) begin
00751                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00752                 crc16 <= 16'd0;
00753                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_START;
00754             end
00755             else begin
00756                 crc16 <= { 1'b1, crc16[15:1] };
00757                 data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00758             end
00759             
00760         end
00761         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_START) begin
00762             sd_data_enable <= 1'b0;
00763             
00764             if(sd_dat_io == 1'b0) begin
00765                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_CONTENTS_END_BIT;
00766                 data_counter <= 24'b0;
00767             end
00768             else if(data_counter == 24'd65535) begin
00769                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR;
00770                 data_counter <= 24'b0;
00771             end
00772             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00773         end
00774         
00775         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_CRC_STATUS_CONTENTS_END_BIT) begin
00776             data_part <= { data_part[30:0], sd_dat_io };
00777             
00778             if(data_counter == 24'd3) begin
00779                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_START;
00780                 data_counter <= 24'b0;
00781             end
00782             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00783         end
00784         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_START) begin
00785             
00786             if(sd_dat_io == 1'b0) begin
00787                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_WAIT;
00788                 data_counter <= 24'b0;
00789             end
00790             else if(data_counter == 24'd65535) begin
00791                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR;
00792                 data_counter <= 24'b0;
00793             end
00794             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00795         end
00796         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_BUSY_WAIT) begin
00797             if(sd_dat_io == 1'b1 && data_part[3:0] != 4'b0101) begin
00798                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR;
00799                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00800             end
00801             else if(sd_dat_io == 1'b1) begin
00802                 clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00803                 data_state <= S_DATA_IDLE;
00804                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00805             end
00806             else if(data_counter == 24'hFFFFFF) begin
00807                 data_state <= S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR;
00808                 data_counter <= 24'd0;
00809             end
00810             else data_counter <= data_counter + 24'd1;
00811         end
00812         else if(data_state == S_DATA_WRITE_ERROR) begin
00813             clk_data_ena <= 1'b0;
00814             data_state <= S_DATA_IDLE;
00815             data_counter <= 24'd0;
00816         end
00817     end
00818 end
00819 
00820 //---------------------------------------------------- SD command
00821 
00822 reg         sd_cmd_enable;
00823 reg [37:0]  cmd_send;
00824 reg [47:0]  cmd_reply;
00825 reg [3:0]   cmd_state;
00826 reg [7:0]   cmd_counter;
00827 reg [6:0]   crc7;
00828 reg         clk_cmd_ena;
00829 
00830 parameter [3:0]
00831     S_CMD_IDLE                  = 4'd0,
00832     S_CMD_SEND_START_ONES       = 4'd1,
00833     S_CMD_SEND_START_BIT        = 4'd2,
00834     S_CMD_SEND_START_HOST       = 4'd3,
00835     S_CMD_SEND_CONTENTS         = 4'd4,
00836     S_CMD_SEND_CRC7             = 4'd5,
00837     S_CMD_SEND_END_BIT          = 4'd6,
00838     S_CMD_SEND_END_ONES         = 4'd7,
00839     S_CMD_REPLY_START_BIT       = 4'd8,
00840     S_CMD_REPLY_CONTENTS        = 4'd9,
00841     S_CMD_REPLY_CRC7_END_BIT    = 4'd10,
00842     S_CMD_REPLY_FINISH_ONES     = 4'd11,
00843     S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR           = 4'd12;
00844     
00845 
00846 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00847     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00848         sd_cmd_enable   <= 1'b0;
00849         cmd_send        <= 38'd0;
00850         cmd_reply       <= 48'd0;
00851         cmd_state       <= S_CMD_IDLE;
00852         cmd_counter     <= 8'd0;
00853         crc7            <= 7'd0;
00854         clk_cmd_ena     <= 1'b0;
00855         sd_cmd_o        <= 1'b1;
00856     end
00857     else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_IDLE) begin
00858         if(start_cmd == 1'b1) begin
00859             cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_START_ONES;
00860         end
00861     end
00862     else if(clk_counter == 2'd0 && clk_master_ena == 1'b1) begin
00863         
00864         //send command
00865         if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_START_ONES) begin
00866             sd_cmd_enable <= 1'b1;
00867             sd_cmd_o <= 1'b1;
00868             clk_cmd_ena <= 1'b1;
00869             crc7 <= 7'd0;
00870             
00871             if(cmd_counter == 8'd7) begin
00872                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_START_BIT;
00873                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00874             end
00875             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00876         end
00877         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_START_BIT) begin
00878             sd_cmd_o <= 1'b0;
00879             crc7 <= { 1'b0 ^ crc7[0], crc7[6:5], 1'b0 ^ crc7[4] ^ crc7[0], crc7[3:1] };
00880             
00881             cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_START_HOST;
00882         end
00883         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_START_HOST) begin
00884             sd_cmd_o <= 1'b1;
00885             crc7 <= { 1'b1 ^ crc7[0], crc7[6:5], 1'b1 ^ crc7[4] ^ crc7[0], crc7[3:1] };
00886             
00887             cmd_send <= cmd_send_contents;
00888             cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_CONTENTS;
00889         end
00890         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_CONTENTS) begin
00891             sd_cmd_o <= cmd_send[37];
00892             crc7 <= { cmd_send[37] ^ crc7[0], crc7[6:5], cmd_send[37] ^ crc7[4] ^ crc7[0], crc7[3:1] };
00893             cmd_send <= { cmd_send[36:0], 1'b0 };
00894             
00895             if(cmd_counter == 8'd37) begin
00896                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_CRC7;
00897                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00898             end
00899             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00900         end
00901         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_CRC7) begin
00902             sd_cmd_o <= crc7[0];
00903             crc7 <= { 1'b0, crc7[6:1] };
00904             
00905             if(cmd_counter == 8'd6) begin
00906                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_END_BIT;
00907                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00908             end
00909             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00910         end
00911         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_END_BIT) begin
00912             sd_cmd_o <= 1'b1;
00913             
00914             // if CMD0: send ones
00915             if(control_state == S_CTRL_CMD0) begin
00916                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_SEND_END_ONES;
00917             end
00918             else begin
00919                 crc7 <= 7'd0;
00920                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_START_BIT;
00921             end
00922         end
00923         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_SEND_END_ONES) begin
00924             sd_cmd_enable <= 1'b0;
00925             sd_cmd_o <= 1'b1;
00926             
00927             if(cmd_counter == 8'd7) begin
00928                 clk_cmd_ena <= 1'b0;
00929                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_IDLE;
00930                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00931             end
00932             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00933         end
00934         
00935         //wait for response: 48-bits with CRC7
00936         //wait for response: 48-bits without CRC7
00937         //wait for response: 136-bits (CMD2/R2)
00938         //wait for response and busy on data line simultaneously: (CMD7/R1b)
00939         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_START_BIT) begin
00940             sd_cmd_enable <= 1'b0;
00941             
00942             if(sd_cmd_io == 1'b0) begin
00943                 crc7 <= { sd_cmd_io ^ crc7[0], crc7[6:5], sd_cmd_io ^ crc7[4] ^ crc7[0], crc7[3:1] };
00944                 cmd_reply <= { cmd_reply[46:0], sd_cmd_io };
00945                 
00946                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_CONTENTS;
00947                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00948             end
00949             else if(cmd_counter == 8'd255) begin
00950                 crc7 <= 7'd0;
00951                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR;
00952                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00953             end
00954             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00955         end
00956         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_CONTENTS) begin
00957             crc7 <= { sd_cmd_io ^ crc7[0], crc7[6:5], sd_cmd_io ^ crc7[4] ^ crc7[0], crc7[3:1] };
00958             cmd_reply <= { cmd_reply[46:0], sd_cmd_io };
00959             
00960             if( (control_state != S_CTRL_CMD2 && cmd_counter == 8'd38) ||
00961                 (control_state == S_CTRL_CMD2 && cmd_counter == 8'd126)
00962             ) begin
00963                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_CRC7_END_BIT;
00964                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00965             end
00966             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00967         end
00968         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_CRC7_END_BIT) begin
00969             cmd_reply <= { cmd_reply[46:0], sd_cmd_io };
00970             
00971             if(cmd_counter == 8'd7) begin
00972                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_FINISH_ONES;
00973                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00974             end
00975             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00976         end
00977         //at least 2 clock cycles required for data write
00978         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_FINISH_ONES) begin
00979             //check is sd_dat_io busy for CMD7
00980             if(cmd_counter >= 8'd7 && (control_state != S_CTRL_CMD7 || sd_dat_io == 1'b1)) begin
00981                 clk_cmd_ena <= 1'b0;
00982                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_IDLE;
00983                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00984             end
00985             else if(cmd_counter == 8'd255) begin
00986                 cmd_state <= S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR;
00987                 cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00988             end
00989             else cmd_counter <= cmd_counter + 8'd1;
00990         end
00991         else if(cmd_state == S_CMD_REPLY_ERROR) begin
00992             clk_cmd_ena <= 1'b0;
00993             cmd_state <= S_CMD_IDLE;
00994             cmd_counter <= 8'd0;
00995         end 
00996     end
00997 end
00998 
00999 //---------------------------------------------------- SD clock
01000 
01001 reg [1:0] clk_counter;
01002 
01003 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
01004     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
01005         sd_clk_o <= 1'b0;
01006         clk_counter <= 2'd0;
01007     end
01008     else if(clk_counter == 2'd0) begin
01009         if(clk_master_ena == 1'b1 && (clk_cmd_ena == 1'b1 || clk_data_ena == 1'b1)) begin
01010             clk_counter <= clk_counter + 2'd1;
01011         end
01012     end
01013     else if(clk_counter == 2'd1) begin
01014         sd_clk_o <= 1'b1;
01015         clk_counter <= clk_counter + 2'd1;
01016     end
01017     else if(clk_counter == 2'd2) begin
01018         clk_counter <= clk_counter + 2'd1;
01019     end
01020     else if(clk_counter == 2'd3) begin
01021         sd_clk_o <= 1'b0;
01022         clk_counter <= clk_counter + 2'd1;
01023     end
01024 end
01025 
01026 endmodule
